name: Healthcare Staffing - Lead Routing & Assignment
description: Automatically route incoming nursing candidate leads to recruiters by geographic region, then assign to the recruiter with the lowest workload using round-robin logic. Notifies assigned recruiter via email and Slack.
useCase: Route new nursing candidate leads to the appropriate regional recruiter team (West Coast, East Coast, Midwest, South), then automatically assign to the recruiter with the lowest current workload. Ensures fair distribution, prevents recruiter burnout, and maintains fast response times. Ideal for staffing agencies with distributed recruiting teams.
author: Caphe Workflows

regionalRouting.westCoast: CA, OR, WA, NV, AZ, HI, AK
regionalRouting.eastCoast: NY, NJ, PA, MA, CT, RI, VT, NH, ME, MD, DE, VA, WV
regionalRouting.midwest: IL, IN, OH, MI, WI, MN, IA, MO, ND, SD, NE, KS
regionalRouting.south: TX, FL, GA, NC, SC, TN, AL, MS, LA, AR, OK, KY

assignmentLogic: Lowest workload (active_leads count) within regional recruiter pool. Ties are resolved by order in recruiter list.
limitations: Workload must be manually updated when leads close
